articles.title: Senior Gurugram town planner asks Mahira homebuyers to not pay more to builder; authorities to take possession of Sector 68 project next week
articles.description: A majority of the buyers who have invested in the Sector 68 project in Gurugram have paid almost 90 percent of what their flats cost. A total of 1,497 buyers have invested in the project.
articles.content:
